doctor.name: Dr. Md. Rezaul Alam
doctor.workplace: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Rezaul Alam is a Kidney Specialist in Narayanganj. His qualification is MBBS, MCPS (Medicine), MD (Nephrology). He is a Assistant Professor, Nephrology at Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Rezaul Alam at Popular Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj is 5pm to 10pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Samina Masud Santa
doctor.workplace: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Samina Masud Santa is a Pediatric Nephrologist in Narayanganj. Her qualification is MBBS, MD (Pediatric Nephrology). She is a Consultant, Pediatric Nephrology at Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj. Practicing hour of Dr. Samina Masud Santa at Popular Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj is 4pm to 8pm (Sat, Wed & Fri).

doctor.name: Dr. Mohammad Ashikur Rahman Khan
doctor.info: Dr. Mohammad Ashikur Rahman Khan is a Nephrologist in Narayanganj. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Medicine), MD (Nephrology), CCD (BIRDEM). He is a Resident Physician, Nephrology at Dhaka Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Medinova Medical Services, Narayanganj. Practicing hour of Dr. Mohammad Ashikur Rahman Khan at Medinova Medical Services, Narayanganj is Sunday, Monday, Wednesday & Friday.
